synopsis.text: Romance of the Three Kingdoms takes a modern twist in this thrilling anime adaptation of Bai Mao's Chinese novel series. Set in present-day Keishuu, China, a land once marked by relentless warfare during the era of the Three Kingdoms, the story follows Sonshin, an ordinary high school student who despises his city's rich history. Plagued by a recurring dream, Sonshin's mundane life takes a dramatic turn when he encounters Gien, a legendary general from the Romance of the Three Kingdoms, who inexplicably seeks to end his life. As Gien's lethal strike nears, a captivating and enigmatic woman appears, shielding Sonshin from imminent danger. Unbeknownst to Sonshin, he is about to embark on a series of extraordinary trials, where historical figures from the Three Kingdoms are summoned using mystical cards. Join Sonshin and the mysterious woman as they navigate through this action-packed adventure, where history and the present collide.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
